snippet: Ms. Fernandez’s indefatigable advocacy for better treatment of foreign workers prompted her government to denounce her and human rights groups to shower her with awards.
abstract: Irene Fernandez, champion of oppressed in Malaysia whose advocacy for better treatment of foreign migrant workers prompted her government to denounce her and human rights groups to shower her with awards, dies at age 67.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Fernandez’s indefatigable advocacy for better treatment of foreign workers prompted her government to denounce her and human rights groups to shower her with awards.

headline.main: Irene Fernandez, Champion of the Oppressed in Malaysia, Dies at 67
headline.print_headline: Irene Fernandez, 67, Fighter for the Oppressed, Is Dead

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
